channel.title: Posts on Graham Pople
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Graham Pople

item.title: 30 Day Typing Challenge
item.description: I have a confession to make. I’m a professional software developer and have been for many years, and have spent much of my life in front of a keyboard. But my typing absolutely sucks. From a distance it sort of looks like I touch type. My hands certainly move fast enough. But instead of my fingers remaining nicely glued to the home row, where they belong, my left hand will unexpectedly dart over to the right side of the keyboard.

item.title: First!
The Best Garmin Fitness Watch (For Me)
item.description: Fitness watches are electronic watches that monitor health and fitness related metrics throughout the day. Depending on the watch these can range from simple heartbeat measures, to semi-sophisticated sleep analysis, and even full navigational maps. In typical Graham fashion, my feelings about them have gone from ‘couldn’t care less’ through ‘I must have one immediately’ to ‘I own one’ in about 4 days. I’ve chosen the Garmin Vivoactive 4S (Â£230), for these reasons:
